A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a big fan of Star Wars\, I would say that this is the best Star Wars movie since The Empire Strikes Back. It does have it's problems ( The pointless cantina scene and I found Rose to be irritating )\, but the great parts are still there. I especially liked how Kylo Ren killed Snoke\, and to the people who say this is the worst Star Wars movie\, watch the prequels and Rogue One ( Those deserve to be hated ).
